summary: Full-stack developer and QA engineer with expertise in building scalable web applications (React, Next.js) and automated test frameworks (Python, Selenium). Passionate about writing clean code, optimizing workflows, and reducing defects through comprehensive testing strategies.

bullets: Engineered Bio4C Process Pad—a production analytics platform used by 18+ clients (Lotte, Syngene), featuring real-time dashboards and data synchronization across multiple bioprocess parameters.
Designed and implemented h-index clustering algorithm with elbow curve optimization, reducing data processing time by 35% and improving classification precision.
Developed comprehensive REST API integrations with Next.js/React frontend, enabling seamless data flow between client and backend systems.
Architected and automated test suites using Python and Selenium, reducing manual QA effort by 40% and accelerating release cycles.
Tech stack: JavaScript, React, Next.js, Node.js, SQL, Python, REST APIs, CI/CD, Git/GitHub
Developing responsive web applications using HTML, CSS, JavaScript with Laravel backend integration.
Implementing CakePHP-based web solutions for organizational management and community outreach.

projects.desc: Full-featured responsive tourism website with dynamic routing, multi-page layouts, and optimized user interface for exploration and booking.

projects.desc: Interactive task management app demonstrating state management, persistent storage, and real-time UI updates.
